Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: Add PHP 8.5 support and require PHP 8.1+" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- Require PHP 8.1+ (drop PHP 7.x/8.0 support as they are EOL)
- Require Laravel 11+ (drop Laravel 5-10 support as they are EOL)
- Add PHP 8.5 to CI test matrix
- Add DevContainer with PHP 8.5 environment
- Modernize GitHub Actions workflow

## Changes

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `composer.json` | PHP `^8.1`, Laravel `^11.0 \|\| ^12.0`, testbench `^9.0\|^10.0` |
| `.github/workflows/tests.yml` | PHP 8.1-8.5 matrix, separated lint/phpstan/unit_tests jobs |
| `.tool-versions` | PHP 8.5.0 |
| `.devcontainer/` | DevContainer with PHP 8.5 environment |

## Test plan

- [ ] CI passes for all PHP versions (8.1, 8.2, 8.3, 8.4, 8.5)
- [ ] PHPStan analysis passes
- [ ] Unit tests pass with `prefer-lowest` and `prefer-stable`
EOF
)")
